pages.text: The Gust Flower is a light, airy plant with feather-like petals that are in constant motion even in still air. These remarkable plants manipulate air currents around them.

Cultivation Notes:$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil$(br)- Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom$(br)- Growth is accelerated at higher elevations$(br)- When fully bloomed, pushes entities that step on it

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Gust Flower Seeds must be planted on Grove Soil. They grow best at higher altitudes, making mountaintops and elevated gardens ideal for cultivation.

pages.title: Bloom
pages.text: The harvested Gust Flower Bloom feels weightless when held and continues to create small air currents. It is used to create Gust Spell Essence and serves as a component in wind-based magical items.
